SEARCH
Package antcolony.entities

Class StaticTree

java.lang.Object
antcolony.entities.StaticTree
public class StaticTree extends Object
Represents a decorative tree in the environment.

The tree is composed of two parts: 1. An underground root system (procedurally generated via Fractals/Julia Set). 2. The trunk and canopy (recursively generated).

  • Field Details

    • root

      public processing.core.PVector root
      Position of the trunk base (ground surface level).

    • size

      public float size
      Base size of the tree (scale).

    • leafPositions

      public ArrayList<processing.core.PVector> leafPositions
      List of positions where leaves will be drawn. Calculated only once during generation to save performance.

    • colorOffset

      public float colorOffset
      Random color variation to provide individuality to each tree.

    • rootTexture

      public processing.core.PGraphics rootTexture
      Root texture generated by the FractalGenerator.

    • rootGrowth

      private float rootGrowth
      Current growth factor of the roots (0.0 to 1.0). Used to animate roots growing at the start.

    • GROWTH_RATE

      private static final float GROWTH_RATE
      Growth rate of the roots.

    • updateRoots

      public void updateRoots(float dt)
      Updates the root growth animation.
      Parameters:
      dt - Delta time.

    • generate

      private void generate(processing.core.PApplet p, float x, float y, float len, float angle, int depth)
      Generates the tree structure recursively (Basic Fractal Tree algorithm).
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to PApplet.
      x - Current X position.
      y - Current Y position.
      len - Length of the current branch.
      angle - Current angle.
      depth - Recursion depth.

    • display

      public void display(processing.core.PApplet p, int leafColor, int seasonIdx, int rootColor)
      Draws the complete tree.
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to PApplet.
      leafColor - Leaf color (changes with the season).
      seasonIdx - Current season index (used to simulate leaf fall).
      rootColor - Root color (for tinting).

      private void drawTrunk(processing.core.PApplet p, float x, float y, float len, float angle)
      Recursive helper method to draw trunk lines.
